title: "Roborock reinforces its leadership in smart robot vacuum cleaners with new “Roborock Dyad Pro” unveiled for higher cleaning efficiency"
excerpt: "Roborock, the world-class smart robot vacuum cleaner and mop brand for efficient home cleaning, held a press conference on its new product launch “New Roborock Beyond All Cleaners” to introduce a lineup of Roborock autonomous cleaning robots and robot vacuums and floor cleaning devices as well as unveiling the new “Roborock Dyad Pro” as the next-generation cleaning device to improve overall efficiency in house cleaning."
